venue.address_1: 51 Walden Street, Concord Center, Concord, Massachusetts
venue.name: Friends of the Performing Arts in Concord (FOPAC),

item.description:
Balkan Music Night

FAC’s 25th annual Balkan Music Night:
Saturday, March 13, 2010
Concert, 7 pm, and
Balkan folk dance party, 9 pm–2:30 am EST
Friends of the Performing Arts in Concord (FOPAC),
51 Walden Street, Concord Center, Concord, Massachusetts

Beginners and singles are welcome!
Order your tickets online!
Admission:
Concert and dance party $25 • FAC members $24 • Seniors (65+), children under 12 $23
Concert only $20 • FAC members $19 • Seniors (65+), children under 12 $18
Dance party only $15 • FAC members $14 • Seniors (65+), children under 12 $13

Advance ticket purchase is recommended, as the concert usually sells out. Tickets are sold by the Folk Arts Center of New England (until March 12) at 781-662-7475 and by mail order (download the PDF of the Ticket Order Form), and must be paid for in advance (check, Visa, and MasterCard accepted). Tickets may also be purchased online (until March 12) with your credit card (Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover) via PayPal (this option is available to all with a credit card, whether one has a PayPal account or not). Tickets ordered by March 8 will be mailed. Tickets held at the door must be picked up by 7:45 pm; concert seating cannot be guaranteed after that time.

over 20 awesome bands!
